author: abroekhuis
msg: - Incorrect pointers used in discovery, which would result in a segfault in the manager
- Remove logger creation from the manager and reused the one created by the activator
- Added function to close imports when manager is stopped
- Fixed some memory leaks in the framework

author: abroekhuis
msg: CELIX-202: Disabled components in the CMake config.

author: fschumacher
msg: Don't add orderedLibs attribute if it is null.
Avoid NPE on shutdown of ReplicatedContext.

msg: CMS commit to taverna by brenninc
